property.name: TOP_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Text is aligned at the top of the object.

property.name: CENTER_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Text is center aligned vertically in the object.

property.name: BOTTOM_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Text is aligned at the bottom of the object.

property.name: JUSTIFY_ALIGN
property.shortdesc: Lines of text are evenly distributed vertically between the top and bottom of the object.
